decision_questions: What decision changes if this test passes vs fails?
Which critical path objective does it serve?

critical_path_objectives.A: Platform readiness (MCP execution, contract suite, artifact retention, reproducibility, fail-modes)

tests.title: OpenClaw optimization and storage health check
tests.decision_if_pass: Keep autonomous loop enabled and proceed to regression/science execution.
tests.decision_if_fail: Stop long campaigns and remediate memory/compaction/governance setup first.

tests.title: MCP target discovery and availability snapshot
tests.decision_if_pass: Permit compute-routed jobs and full budget scheduling when available.
tests.decision_if_fail: Force LOCAL_ONLY mode and constrain exploration budget to safe defaults.

tests.title: OpenClaw optimization fallback thresholds check
tests.decision_if_pass: Classify platform as conditionally usable and prioritize remediation of strict-threshold gaps.
tests.decision_if_fail: Classify platform readiness as rejected and halt autonomous expansion.

tests.title: Claim 3 Option-B regression stability check
tests.decision_if_pass: Maintain supported Claim 3 status and continue with current model family assumptions.
tests.decision_if_fail: Downgrade Claim 3 support and prioritize model-robustness follow-up tests.

tests.title: Claim 2 seed perturbation regression check
tests.decision_if_pass: Keep Claim 2 marked stable under seed variation.
tests.decision_if_fail: Mark Claim 2 as unstable and require expanded seed coverage before promotion.

tests.title: Claim W02 componentwise infimum executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W02 from DOC_ONLY to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag W02 contradiction and block progression pending formal fix.

tests.title: Claim W06 depth-vector monotonicity executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W06 from DOC_ONLY to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag W06 monotonicity violation and open corrective branch.

tests.title: Claim W08 class-splitting monotonicity executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W08 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag class-splitting monotonicity contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W13 C_obs decomposition compatibility check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W13 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag decomposition/backward-compatibility issue.

tests.title: Claim W14 ejection theorem executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W14 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag set-theoretic contradiction in ejection theorem.

tests.title: Claim W16 time consistency monotonic map check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W16 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag time-consistency mapping contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W09 Delta-T well-definedness executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W09 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag Delta-T well-definedness contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W10 observer non-influence executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W10 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag observer non-influence contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W12 observer-triad mapping executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W12 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag observer triad mapping inconsistency.

tests.title: Claim W03 memory excision consistency executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W03 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag memory excision consistency contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W04 self-reference consistency executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W04 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag self-reference consistency contradiction.

tests.title: Claim W07 cross-axis isolation executable check
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote W07 to LOCAL_EXEC evidence-backed.
tests.decision_if_fail: Flag cross-axis isolation contradiction.

tests.title: Claim 3P cyclic Ising branch check at L=8
tests.decision_if_pass: Increase confidence that Claim 3P model-selection failures are boundary-robust.
tests.decision_if_fail: Keep Claim 3P underdetermined/rejected and prioritize falsifier-specific ablations.

tests.title: Claim 3P cyclic Heisenberg branch check at L=8
tests.decision_if_pass: Strengthen cross-model evidence that Claim 3P behavior is reproducible.
tests.decision_if_fail: Constrain interpretation and document model-specific divergence.

tests.title: Claim 3P larger-system check at L=16
tests.decision_if_pass: Promote L-scaling evidence quality for Claim 3P trend interpretation.
tests.decision_if_fail: Preserve conservative status and defer stronger claims.
